p: The study was carried out in the state of Piauí, in the municipality of Picos (7°04′37′′ S and 41°28′01′′ W). This municipality has approximately 78,222 inhabitants [ 28] and is located on the right bank of the Guaribas River, integrating 1 of the 39 municipalities that make up the Guaribas Valley. Inserted in the Southeast mesoregion of Piauí, it has an area of 803 km 2 and is limited to the municipalities of Santana do Piauí and Sussuapara to the North, Itainópolis to the South, Dom Expedito Lopes and Paquetá to the West, and Sussuapara and Geminiano to the East. The municipality is 306 km away from the capital Teresina [ 29].
